bonus.value: Increase ATK by 15%/19%/22.5% when there are no enemies within 6 meters.

memory.name: Dockbred
memory.desc: The nostrils have been smelling the salty scent of the sea for far too long, they're uncomfortable when it's missing.

belief.name: Haggler
belief.desc: Never buy things at full price, always haggle till your last breath!

emotion.name: Smash Ball
emotion.desc: There are not many recreations you can do with physically handicapped friends.
